articles.author: Rappler.com
articles.title: Delta variant puts Philippine economy among most vulnerable in Asia - Rappler
articles.description: 'Vaccine shortages and ineffective social distancing measures' will make it hard for the Philippine economy to rebound, says Moody's Analytics
articles.content: Moody's Analytics ranked the Philippines 15th out of 20 countries in Asia Pacific in its relative economic risk ranking, just above Indonesia, Malaysia, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Thailand, and Malaysia.
